data.message: Thank you Facebook for letting us stay in touch with our friends and family so far away

replies.message: You're very welcome, Pritpal. We're so happy to hear you're enjoying your Facebook experience. -Hailey
Hi, my other account is in Stand by, But i have lost the passeword of my e-mail adress associat with my account facebook who i can make for my account come back please ?
Please it's important for me i have my artist page and other contact :'(
Hey facebook, you never respond to my requests! Like stopping deciding what's "top strories" for me!

Hey Terry. Top Stories is designed to show you similar stories to ones that you engage with the most before ones that you typically don't. If you want to see stories in the order that they are posted, you can adjust your News Feed to Most Recent. Learn how at: http://on.fb.me/1nIlfDM. -Chantal
